hero.title: Magellan — your intelligent travel companion
hero.subtitle: Magellan captures your journeys, organizes your memories, and transforms them into interactive stories to share.

explore.title: Explore
explore.subtitle: Let Magellan guide your adventure.
explore.description: Discover your journey in real time: steps, photos, and places visited. Magellan suggests ideas, useful information, and inspiration from other travelers to enrich your itinerary, without ever leaving the present moment.

map.title: Dynamic interactive map
map.description: Visualize your journey on a fluid map: steps, photos, distances, and highlights, all at a glance.

discoveries.title: Discoveries around you
discoveries.description: Instantly access the history of places and nearby recommendations, suggested based on your location and interests.

inspirations.title: Travel inspirations
inspirations.description: Browse adventures from other Magellan users and find new ideas tailored to your desires.

share.title: Share
share.subtitle: Experience your journey together, in real time.
share.description: Create a shared album where everyone adds their photos, videos, and messages. Instantly share your highlights with loved ones or your community.

album.title: Collaborative album
album.description: Add photos, videos, and memories in a single shared space for all participants.

chat.title: Built-in album chat
chat.description: Chat, react, and organize your steps together, before, during, and after the trip.

share.title: Instant sharing
share.description: Share your best moments with one click on social media or via a private link.

remember.title: Remember
remember.subtitle: Transform your memories into a living story.
remember.description: Magellan automatically groups your photos, notes, and visited places to create an interactive story enriched with statistics, anecdotes, and your most memorable moments.

grouped.title: Intelligently grouped memories
grouped.description: Your photos, notes, and steps are automatically organized by dates, places, and key moments.

ai.title: AI-generated interactive story
ai.description: With one click, get an animated story of your journey: map, anecdotes, highlights, timeline.

stats.title: Travel statistics
stats.description: Distance traveled, countries visited, steps, great memories: your adventure summarized in numbers.

benefits.title: Why Magellan?
benefits.subtitle: Features designed to transform every journey into a memorable experience.

grouping.title: Smart grouping
grouping.description: Magellan automatically organizes your photos, notes, and memories by destination, date, and key moments. Your journey organizes itself.

albums.title: Instant album creation
albums.description: With one click, AI transforms your journeys into interactive stories, with maps, steps, and anecdotes ready to relive.

sharing.title: Simplified sharing
sharing.description: Choose between private or public sharing, invite your loved ones, and share your albums on social media, without leaving Magellan.

ai.title: Personalized AI assistant
ai.description: A companion that knows you: dynamic suggestions for places, highlights, and content ideas, tailored to your preferences and the context of each journey.

centralization.title: Centralization of your information
centralization.description: Centralize your bookings, itineraries, emails, and notes. Magellan transforms the chaos of preparations into a clear, shareable plan.

privacy.title: Privacy by design
privacy.description: Your data remains your data. Simple and transparent privacy settings.

exploration.title: Intelligent exploration
exploration.description: Discover the stories behind each place thanks to AI that automatically enriches your photos and notes.

journal.title: Automatic travel log
journal.description: Your journeys organize themselves into interactive stories with maps, steps, and anecdotes, with no effort on your part.

sharing.title: One-click sharing
sharing.description: Share your adventures with loved ones or publish them on social media, directly from the app.

appPreview.previewAlt: Magellan app preview with interactive map

about.title: Our story
about.subtitle: Reinventing exploration and memory creation
about.paragraph1: Magellan was born from a simple idea: to transform every journey into a richer, smoother, and more memorable experience. Our belief? Travel is not just about moving from place to place. It's a moment of emotion, discovery, connection. An adventure that deserves to be understood—and shared—differently.
about.paragraph2: Thanks to generative artificial intelligence, Magellan becomes the essential tool for modern travelers: an app capable of enriching every stage of the journey, effortlessly organizing memories, and automatically telling living, authentic, and personalized stories.
about.paragraph3: Our core value: making every journey an enriched cultural exploration, while simplifying the creation of captivating and shareable memories.

genesis.title: The genesis: the day it all began
genesis.paragraph1: It all started with a trip to Morocco. With a friend, we wandered through villages, medinas, alleys steeped in history... but paradoxically, we found no clear information about the places we were visiting.
genesis.paragraph2: So a question arose: what if a simple photo could tell us the story of the world around us?
genesis.paragraph3: What if, by capturing a monument, a scene of life, or a landscape, AI could instantly offer us its precise description, its little-known anecdotes, its historical context, nearby recommendations, and even ideas to enrich our travel journal?
genesis.paragraph4: This idea—born on a bustling square in Marrakech—became the cornerstone of Magellan. Since that day, our ambition has remained the same: to give every traveler the power to explore, understand, and share the world like never before.

whyMagellan.title: Why Magellan?
whyMagellan.subtitle: Features designed to transform every journey into a memorable experience.

confidential.title: Optimal privacy
confidential.description: You choose who can see your journey. Family, friends, or no one.

consumption.title: Ultra-low consumption
consumption.description: Optimized to preserve your battery and mobile data.

privacy.title: Privacy by design
privacy.description: Zero tracking, zero advertising. Your data remains yours.

offline.title: Works offline
offline.description: Access your journeys even without connection

noads.title: No ads
noads.description: A 100% dedicated experience to your journeys, without interruption

france.title: Designed and developed in France
france.description: An app conceived and created in France, for travelers around the world

performance.title: Instant photo performance
performance.description: Capture and share your moments instantly, without waiting

export.title: Integrated Instagram & TikTok export
export.description: Share your journeys directly on your favorite networks

free.title: Free usage
free.description: Access all essential features without subscription

beta.title: Join Magellan beta
beta.subtitle: Be among the first travelers to discover Magellan and shape the future of exploration.

earlyAccess.title: Early access
earlyAccess.description: Be among the first to test new features and share your feedback.

noSpam.title: No spam
noSpam.description: We respect your privacy. No advertising, unsubscribe at any time.

invitations.title: Exclusive invitations
invitations.description: Receive invitations to participate in testing sessions and influence development.
